---
title: "Skills Max Match Courses and DSDE (Jan 2010-Dec 2016)"
output:
  pdf_document: default
  html_notebook: default
---


```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggplot2)
library(zoo)
library(grid)
library(tscount)
library(svglite)
library(scales)
skills <- read.csv("skills-MaxMatch-DSDE-Courses-2010-2016.csv", header=TRUE)


g <-   ggplot(skills, aes(x = Frequency, y = Skills, color=Type)) +
         geom_line(size = 1.0) +
  scale_x_continuous(trans = log10_trans(),expand = c(0, 0)) +

  xlab("Log10 (Ranking)") + ylab("Skill Count") +
       theme_classic() +
   theme(legend.position = c(0.15, 0.8)) +
   theme(legend.title=element_blank())
 
#ggsave(g, device ="png", file="skills-MaxMatch-DSDE-Courses-2010-2016.png")
#ggsave(g, device ="svg", file="skills-MaxMatch-DSDE-Courses-2010-2016.png.svg")
```


```{r echo=FALSE,message=FALSE}

suppressWarnings(print(g))
```
